participant_1.background: I was born in baton rouge. I have male pattern baldness. I am a classily trained chef. I have a parrot named parrot. My mother does not ! ove me.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Curious and cheerful, enjoys exploring new activities and making friends.
participant_2.background: I like to play soccer, draw and read asteria. I am in 3rd grade. I live with my parents and my little brother. I do not have too many friends in the us yet, but i am going to summer camp and i hope to make friends then! I also think that i may make friends as soccer in the fall.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi!
Where are you from?
I'm from the US.
Oh, cool! I'm from Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
Oh, that's cool! I've never been to Louisiana.
It's a great place to live. The food is amazing!
I love food! What's your favorite food?
I love Cajun food. Crawfish, shrimp, gumbo... I love it all!
Oh, that sounds delicious! I've never had Cajun food before.
You're missing out! It's the best!
I'll have to try it sometime.
You won't regret it!
What do you do for fun?
I love to cook, play video games, and watch movies.
I love to cook too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook anything Cajun. I also love to make seafood dishes.
Oh, that sounds delicious! I love seafood.
Me too! It's the best!
What video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of games, but I really love open world games. I like to be able to explore and do whatever I want.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of fun! I've never played an open world game before.
You should! They're a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
